price: Tomamo-los por objeto de escárnio por engano, ou se nos desviaram deles as vistas?"
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
